content.raw: We attempted a fix about 1.5 days ago… I believe it is due to a discrepancy in Python2.7 vs Python3 dependencies. The image was working for us a couple of days ago, but I’m not sure what is going on. Our fix from 1.5 days ago was to revert the `python3` shebangs to just `python`. Please let me know if you have retested this.
content.html: We attempted a fix about 1.5 days ago… I believe it is due to a discrepancy in Python2.7 vs Python3 dependencies. Please let me know if you have retested this.
